title: Innovative Prison Education Project to Overcome the Digital Divide: Utilizing Language Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Simulation-based project learning environment addressing digital infrastructure deficits and declining educational quality in prison settings. Focuses on developing applicable digital solutions for real correctional education contexts

learning_goals: Learners design three or more language education contents applicable to a prison environment using a digital learning platform.
Learners develop one prototype of a learning tool to address the digital divide through project-based collaboration.
Learners set five educational effectiveness metrics and write a performance report for digital solutions.

resources: Digital Content Authoring Software (Canva, Articulate 360, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
